price: Diles: "Sigan esperando, que yo esperaré junto a ustedes".
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
